page.title: 03The Grosvenors in Cheshire.
page.content: Nearly all of the land & buildings (including Saighton village) west of the "A"41(T) road & north of Platts Lane are owned by the 6th Duke of Westminster.The farmland is managed for him as part of the "Grosvenor Estates",as one entity & run by a farm manager. Some of the{farmhouses on the Estate are tenanted by its employees but they have no control over the land about their homes. Other farmhouses are rented out eg. Hattonheath Farmhouse to a builder's family; Hatton Lodge & Elmtree farmhouse to students from Chester law college.Non-farm houses are also tenanted by employees or are rented to eg.a tree surgeon.Under the Duke's patronage a slightly feudal society seems to exist with people being somewhat reticent & they either accept what the Estate does or leave!
